Image.Text: Welcome to ChemCraft, a world where chemical compounds are alive and sentient! Who am I? Well perhaps a better question would be Where am I!

BOOM! I am a Methane molecule! I came from the beaker you had over the bunsen burner. On that note, you really should not place methane over fire. We're highly flammable and if you were a little closer you would've gotten caught in my explosion. Lab safety is key.
